article.title: Raytheon To Produce Maverick Missiles For The United Arab Emirates
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Raytheon Company has been awarded a $170 million Foreign Military Sales contract from the U.S. Air Force to produce AGM-65D and AGM65G2 infrared-guided Maverick air-to-surface missiles for the United Arab Emirates. Under the agreement, Raytheon will build and provide life-cycle support for more than 500 new missiles.
